title: Cannot determine a type for this expression
body:
```
type actor<T> = {                                                                                                                                                             
    unused: bool                                                                                                                                                              
};                                                                                                                                                                            

fn act2<T>() -> actor<T> {                                                                                                                                                    
    fail;                                                                                                                                                                     
}                                                                                                                                                                             

fn main() {                                                                                                                                                                   
    let a: actor<int> = act2();                                                                                                                                               
}      
```

```
../src/test/run-pass/issue-1471.rs:10:24: 10:28 error: cannot determine a type for this expression
../src/test/run-pass/issue-1471.rs:10     let a: actor<int> = act2();
```

If `act2` returns `T` instead of `actor<T>` then `T` can be inferred correctly.
